name: Chased Around The World
description:
A small casual turn based game where you play as a thief collecting money bags or the police gathering clues to locate the thief.
At the same time, you can sharpen up your geography skills, learn where countries and it´s neighbors are located.

Thief
Collecting money bags while trying to avoid the police. Choose your countries wisely, if the police use it´s scanner and you are inside the borders of the same or a neighboring country, you get caught!
As a thief you can also try to collect cards, all unique to a certain country.

Police
Take control over 3 police officers and try to locate the thief.
Collect footprints to gain clues where the thief might be going and use your abilities carefully.

BEFORE YOU BUY
Please keep in mind this game does not offer much depth and is designed for short sessions, for when you just want to pass some time.
Check out the three minute gameplay video to see if this is a game for you.

FEATURES
  • Short session game (15-25 minutes) For when you just want to pastime.
  • 22 country cards, all presenting something famous for that country.
  • Interactive tutorial.
  • Three maps to play on, Eurasia (Europe and Asia), Eurafrasia (Europe, Asia and Africa), World (All continents)
  • Easy, medium and hard difficulty levels.
  • Up to 139 countries to travel between.
  • Improve your geography skills.
  • Play as a thief or the police. Human, cat or dog.
